name: Pirate Pinball (Haeherfeder)
description:
The website https://letsmakeagame.net/game-idea-generator told me to make the following game:

  • Genre: Pinball & Action
  • Rule: Start with nothing
  • Setting: Pirate
  • Theme: Addiction

... so I did   --  or at least I'm at it

This is the first version of the game, but you can already play it:

  • Use the cannon balls to shoot the enemy ships
  • Don't let the ball fall between the two flippers
  • Collect as much rum as possible from captured ships
  • Obstacles such as islands and swirls that influence the ball
  • It has music made by me!

Plans for updates:

  • Create a map where the player can drive around and choose a target fleet to attack
  • Add an alcohol addict captain that treats you for bringing him rum
  • "Treats" are skins and upgrades
  • Make the game more action-packed somehow

Things I used for this project:

  • Godot Game Engine
  • https://letsmakeagame.net/game-idea-generator
  • https://freesound.org/
  • Maestro Composer App
  • Inkscape
